title: Voices of Blood
description: The fleet finally discovers land, but a new and unanticipated supernatural ability embroils the Armanian people in a bitter conflict. Wilek establishes a capitol city, and puts Trevn in charge of an exploratory expedition. In the west, the Magonians prepare for the prophesied uprising of the Deliverer, who they believe will make Magonia the ruler of nations.
author: Jill Williamson
